Verses: 1 pavulum, Silvaanum, Theemoththeyum, Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukkullum, Karththaraagiyayesukiristhuvukkullum Irukkira Thesalonikkeyar Sabaikku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

3 sagodharare, Naangal Eppozhudhum Ungalukkaaga Dhevanai Sthoththirikkak Kadanaaligalaayirukkirom; Ungal Visuvaasam Migavum Perugugirapadiyinaalum, Neengalellaarum Oruvariloruvar Vaiththirukkira Anbu Adhigarikkirapadiyinaalum, Appadi Seygiradhu Thagudhiyaayirukkiradhu.
4 neengal Sagikkira Sagala Thunbangalilum Ubaththiravangalilum Porumaiyaiyum Visuvaasaththaiyum Kaanbikkiradhinimiththam Ungalaikkuriththu Naangal Dhevanudaiya Sabaigalil Menmaipaaraattugirom.

5 neengal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththinimiththam Paadu Anubavikkiravargalaayirukka, Andha Raajyaththirku Neengal Paaththirarendrennappadumpadikku, Dhevan Niyaayamaana Theerppuseygiravarenbadharku, Adhuve Aththaatchiyaayirukkiradhu.
6 ungalai Ubaththiravappaduththugiravargalukku Ubaththiravaththaiyum, Ubaththiravappadugira Ungalukku Engalodekooda Ilaippaarudhalaiyum Piradhipalanaagakkoduppadhu Dhevanukku Needhiyaayirukkiradhe.
7 dhevanai Ariyaadhavargalukkum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Suviseshaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavargalukkum Needhiyulla Aakkinaiyai Seluththumpadikku,
8 karththaraagiya Yesu Thamadhu Vallamaiyin Thoodharodum, Juvaaliththu Erigira Akkiniyodum, Vaanaththilirundhu Velippadumpodhu Appadiyaagum.

9 annaalile Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalil Magimaippadaththakkavaraayum, Neengal Engaludaiya Saatchiyai Visuvaasiththapadiyinaale Ungalidaththilum, Visuvaasikkiravargalellaaridaththilum Aachchariyappadaththakkavaraayum, Avar Varumpodhu,
10 avargal Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththilirundhum, Avarudaiya Vallamaiporundhiya Magimaiyilirundhum Neengalaaki, Niththiya Azhivaagiya Dhandanaiyai Adaivaargal.

11 aagaiyaal, Nammudaiya Dhevanum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvum Alikkum Kirubaiyinpadiye, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamam Ungalidaththilum, Neengal Avaridaththilum Magimaippadumporuttaaga;

12 nammudaiya Dhevan Ungalaith Thamadhu Azhaippukkup Paaththiraraakkavum, Thamadhu Thayaiyulla Siththam Muzhuvadhaiyum Visuvaasaththin Kiriyaiyaiyum Balamaai Ungalidaththil Niraivetravum Vendumendru, Eppozhudhum Ungalukkaaga Vendikkollugirom.
